name: Space Destroyer (ChaosWarrior00)
description:
This Game was built for Educational and Portfolio purposes.

First game pushed to itch.io

An arcade style mini game I built for a school prototype using assets that where free for public use. hope you enjoy and feel free to provide any feedback.

Links to Asset Used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/absolute-space-sci-fi-music-free-sample-103274

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/weapons/ultra-sci-fi-game-audio-weapons-pack-vol-1-113047

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/simple-explosion-76511

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/alien-ships-pack-131137

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/star-sparrow-modular-spaceship-73167
